ComicInfo.Summary:
Andy Diggle (THE LOSERS) and Enriqué Breccia (LOVECRAFT) join forces to bring new life to the swamp. Stripped of Alec Holland's human conscience, the Swamp Thing seeks to restore balance to the natural world, but at what cost to his daughter Tefé, his wife Abby and John Constantine?
